duc.title: Medication Entry - Search
duc.description: This DUC represents workflow for free text search on medication entry list view

noteValues: Medication Entry displayed as per the positive search
Medication Entry displayed as per the negative search
Medication Entry displayed as per the wildcard search for partial generic name
Medication Entry displayed as per the case insensitive search
testCases: Verify the medication Entry search - positive search result
Verify the medication Entry search - negative search result
Verify the medication Entry search - wildcard search result
Verify the medication Entry search - case insensitive search result
